summary: This bill, known as the "No Retaining Every Gun In a System That Restricts Your Rights Act," aims to restrict the federal government's retention of firearm transaction records. It mandates the destruction of existing records held by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives (ATF) related to discontinued firearms businesses. Furthermore, it amends existing law to prevent the future collection of such records and requires the ATF to submit a report to Congress detailing the number of records destroyed.
